articles.title: Migrant crisis: Priti Patel not included in Calais meeting - BBC News
articles.description: The home secretary says failure by Europe to co-operate with the UK could lead to "even worse scenes".
articles.content:
By Malu CursinoBBC News
Home Secretary Priti Patel has warned that failure by European politicians to co-operate on the continent's migrant crisis will lead to "even worse scenes" in the English Cha… [+3396 chars]

articles.title: European Commission recommends travel ban on southern Africa amid fears over new Covid variant - The Irish Times

articles.content: EU member states have agreed to introduce rapidly restrictions on all travel into the region from seven countries in southern Africa, European Commission president Ursula von der Leyens spokesman has… [+2895 chars]
